metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010180 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
GNU gdb All versions is affected by: Buffer Overflow - Out of bound memoryaccess. The impact is: Deny of Service, Memory Disclosure, and PossibleCode Execution. The component is: The main gdb module. The attack vectoris: Open an ELF for debugging. The fixed version is: Not fixed yet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1010180` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 8.3-0ubuntu1
gdb-multiarch - 8.3-0ubuntu1
gdb-source - 8.3-0ubuntu1
gdbserver - 8.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdb package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.3-0ubuntu1').
